from sqlalchemy import create_engine from sqlalchemy.orm import sessionmaker, DeclarativeBase from core.config_loader import settings
# Create database URL but don't test connection during import DATABASE_URL = str(settings.SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI)
# Use pool settings to prevent hanging connections engine = create_engine( DATABASE_URL, pool_pre_ping=True, pool_recycle=300, connect_args={"connect_timeout": 10} ) SessionLocal = sessionmaker(autocommit=False, autoflush=False, bind=engine)
class Base(DeclarativeBase): pass
def get_db(): db = SessionLocal() try: yield db finally: db.close()
